channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28323|2023-06-30T23:40:30.788Z -- ivanti -- ivanti%20endpoint%20manager
item.description: A deserialization of untrusted data exists in EPM 2022 Su3 and all prior versions that allows an unauthenticated user to elevate rights. This exploit could potentially be used in conjunction with other OS (Operating System) vulnerabilities to escalate privileges on the machine or be used as a stepping stone to get to other network attached machines.

item.title: CVE-2023-28324|2023-06-30T23:40:19.571Z -- ivanti -- ivanti%20endpoint%20manager
item.description: A improper input validation vulnerability exists in Ivanti Endpoint Manager 2022 and below that could allow privilege escalation or remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-28129|2023-10-18T03:55:18.405Z -- ivanti -- desktop%20%26%20server%20management%20%28dsm%29
item.description: DSM 2022.2 SU2 and all prior versions allows a local low privileged account to execute arbitrary OS commands as the DSM software installation user.

item.title: CVE-2023-38035|2023-08-21T16:51:20.678Z -- ivanti -- mobileiron%20sentry
item.description: A security vulnerability in MICS Admin Portal in Ivanti MobileIron Sentry versions 9.18.0 and below, which may allow an attacker to bypass authentication controls on the administrative interface due to an insufficiently restrictive Apache HTTPD configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-38042|2024-05-31T17:38:31.427Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20client
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Windows allows a low privileged user to execute code as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2023-38043|2023-11-22T23:28:30.779Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20client%20windows
item.description: A vulnerability exists on all versions of the Ivanti Secure Access Client below 22.6R1.1, which could allow a locally authenticated attacker to exploit a vulnerable configuration, potentially leading to a denial of service (DoS) condition on the user machine and, in some cases, resulting in a full compromise of the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-38551|2024-06-04T17:28:21.734Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A CRLF Injection vulnerability in Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) allows an authenticated high-privileged user to inject malicious code on a victimâ€™s browser, thereby leading to cross-site scripting attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-38544|2023-11-14T23:18:08.379Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20linux
item.description: A logged in user can modify specific files that may lead to unauthorized changes in system-wide configuration settings. This vulnerability could be exploited to compromise the integrity and security of the network on the affected system.

item.title: CVE-2023-38543|2023-11-22T23:28:30.776Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20client%20windows
item.description: A vulnerability exists on all versions of the Ivanti Secure Access Client below 22.6R1.1, which could allow a locally authenticated attacker to exploit a vulnerable configuration, potentially leading to a denial of service (DoS) condition on the user machine.

item.title: CVE-2023-38041|2023-10-25T00:24:34.090Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20client
item.description: A logged in user may elevate its permissions by abusing a Time-of-Check to Time-of-Use (TOCTOU) race condition. When a particular process flow is initiated, an attacker can exploit this condition to gain unauthorized elevated privileges on the affected system.

item.title: CVE-2023-39340|2023-12-16T01:49:21.623Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A vulnerability exists on all versions of Ivanti Connect Secure below 22.6R2 where an attacker can send a specific request which may lead to Denial of Service (DoS) of the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2023-39337|2023-11-14T23:18:08.440Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: A security vulnerability in EPMM Versions 11.10, 11.9 and 11.8 older allows a threat actor with knowledge of an enrolled device identifier to access and extract sensitive information, including device and environment configuration details, as well as secrets. This vulnerability poses a serious security risk, potentially exposing confidential data and system integrity.

item.title: CVE-2023-39336|2024-01-09T01:33:05.875Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Ivanti Endpoint Manager released prior to 2022 SU 5 allows an attacker with access to the internal network to execute arbitrary SQL queries and retrieve output without the need for authentication. Under specific circumstances, this may also lead to RCE on the core server.

item.title: CVE-2023-39335|2023-11-14T23:18:08.402Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: A security vulnerability has been identified in EPMM Versions 11.10, 11.9 and 11.8 and older allowing an unauthenticated threat actor to impersonate any existing user during the device enrollment process. This issue poses a significant security risk, as it enables unauthorized access and potential misuse of user accounts and resources.

item.title: CVE-2023-32567|2023-11-03T18:13:19.987Z -- ivanti -- wavelink
item.description: Ivanti Avalanche decodeToMap XML External Entity Processing. Fixed in version 6.4.1.236

item.title: CVE-2023-32566|2023-08-10T18:58:36.194Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker can send a specially crafted request which could lead to leakage of sensitive data or potentially a resource-based DoS attack. Fixed in version 6.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-32561|2023-08-10T19:07:32.960Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A previously generated artifact by an administrator could be accessed by an attacker. The contents of this artifact could lead to authentication bypass. Fixed in version 6.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-32560|2023-08-10T19:07:38.628Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description:
An attacker can send a specially crafted message to the Wavelink Avalanche Manager, which could result in service disruption or arbitrary code execution.
Thanks to a Researcher at Tenable for finding and reporting.
Fixed in version 6.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-32563|2023-08-10T19:04:48.128Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker could achieve the code execution through a RemoteControl server.

item.title: CVE-2023-32562|2023-08-10T19:04:54.388Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability exists in Avalanche versions 6.3.x and below that could allow an attacker to achieve a remove code execution. Fixed in version 6.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-32565|2023-08-10T19:03:46.116Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker can send a specially crafted request which could lead to leakage of sensitive data or potentially a resource-based DoS attack. Fixed in version 6.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-32564|2023-08-10T19:04:43.054Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability exists in Avalanche versions 6.4.1 and below that could allow an attacker to achieve a remove code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-46217|2023-12-19T15:43:26.322Z -- ivanti -- wavelink
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-46807|2024-06-04T17:22:20.190Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability in web component of EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated user with appropriate privilege to access or modify data in the underlying database.

item.title: CVE-2023-46221|2023-12-19T15:43:26.331Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-46810|2024-05-31T17:38:31.425Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20linux
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Linux before 22.7R1, allows a low privileged user to execute code as root.

item.title: CVE-2023-46806|2024-06-04T17:22:17.015Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An SQL Injection vulnerability in a web component of EPMM versions before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated user with appropriate privilege to access or modify data in the underlying database.

item.title: CVE-2023-46257|2023-12-19T15:43:26.308Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.description: An attacker can send a specially crafted request which could lead to leakage of sensitive data or potentially a resource-based DoS attack.

item.description: An unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability exists in Avalanche versions 6.4.1 and below that could allow an attacker to achieve a remove code execution.

item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS).

item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-46265|2023-12-19T15:43:26.312Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unauthenticated could abuse a XXE vulnerability in the Smart Device Server to leak data or perform a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF).

item.title: CVE-2023-46805|2024-01-12T17:02:16.452Z -- ivanti -- ics
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in the web component of Ivanti ICS 9.x, 22.x and Ivanti Policy Secure allows a remote attacker to access restricted resources by bypassing control checks.

item.title: CVE-2023-46262|2023-12-19T15:43:26.338Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unauthenticated attacked could send a specifically crafted web request causing a Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in Ivanti Avalanche Remote Control server.

item.title: CVE-2023-46223|2023-12-19T15:43:26.253Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-46258|2023-12-19T15:43:26.342Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-46259|2023-12-19T15:43:26.279Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-46808|2024-03-31T01:45:43.264Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An file upload vulnerability in Ivanti ITSM before 2023.4, allows an authenticated remote user to perform file writes to the server. Successful exploitation may lead to execution of commands in the context of non-root user.

item.title: CVE-2023-46222|2023-12-19T15:43:26.329Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-46263|2023-12-19T15:43:26.291Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability exists in Avalanche versions 6.4.1 and below that could allow an attacker to achieve a remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-46804|2023-12-19T15:43:26.303Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS).

item.title: CVE-2023-41726|2023-11-03T18:13:19.997Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Ivanti Avalanche Incorrect Default Permissions allows Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

item.title: CVE-2023-41727|2023-12-19T15:43:26.326Z -- ivanti -- wavelink
item.description: An attacker sending specially crafted data packets to the Mobile Device Server can cause memory corruption which could result to a Denial of Service (DoS) or code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-41720|2023-12-14T01:56:44.839Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A vulnerability exists on all versions of Ivanti Connect Secure below 22.6R2 where an attacker with a foothold on an Ivanti Connect Secure (ICS) appliance can escalate their privileges by exploiting a vulnerable installed application. This vulnerability allows the attacker to gain elevated execution privileges on the affected system.

item.title: CVE-2023-41718|2023-11-14T23:18:08.415Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access
item.description: When a particular process flow is initiated, an attacker may be able to gain unauthorized elevated privileges on the affected system when having control over a specific file.

item.title: CVE-2023-41719|2023-12-14T01:56:44.867Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A vulnerability exists on all versions of Ivanti Connect Secure below 22.6R2 where an attacker impersonating an administrator may craft a specific web request which may lead to remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-41724|2024-03-31T01:45:42.684Z -- ivanti -- sentry
item.description: A command injection vulnerability in Ivanti Sentry prior to 9.19.0 allows unauthenticated threat actor to execute arbitrary commands on the underlying operating system of the appliance within the same physical or logical network.

item.title: CVE-2023-41725|2023-11-03T18:13:19.979Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: Ivanti Avalanche EnterpriseServer Service Unrestricted File Upload Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

item.title: CVE-2023-35083|2023-10-18T03:52:12.988Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: Allows an authenticated attacker with network access to read arbitrary files on Endpoint Manager recently discovered on 2022 SU3 and all previous versions potentially leading to the leakage of sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2023-35077|2023-07-21T20:51:29.385Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability on windows operating systems causes the Ivanti AntiVirus Product to crash. Update to Ivanti AV Product version 7.9.1.285 or above.

item.title: CVE-2023-35082|2023-08-15T15:11:56.545Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in Ivanti EPMM 11.10 and older, allows unauthorized users to access restricted functionality or resources of the application without proper authentication. This vulnerability is unique to CVE-2023-35078 announced earlier.

item.title: CVE-2023-35084|2023-10-18T03:52:06.581Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager
item.description: Unsafe Deserialization of User Input could lead to Execution of Unauthorized Operations in Ivanti Endpoint Manager 2022 su3 and all previous versions, which could allow an attacker to execute commands remotely.

item.title: CVE-2023-35081|2023-08-03T17:00:10.822Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability in Ivanti EPMM versions (11.10.x < 11.10.0.3, 11.9.x < 11.9.1.2 and 11.8.x < 11.8.1.2) allows an authenticated administrator to write arbitrary files onto the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2023-35078|2023-11-28T19:30:31.171Z -- ivanti -- endpoint%20manager%20mobile
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability in Ivanti EPMM allows unauthorized users to access restricted functionality or resources of the application without proper authentication.

item.title: CVE-2023-35080|2023-11-14T23:18:08.387Z -- ivanti -- secure%20access%20client
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in the Ivanti Secure Access Windows client, which could allow a locally authenticated attacker to exploit a vulnerable configuration, potentially leading to various security risks, including the escalation of privileges, denial of service, or information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-29204|2024-06-04T17:58:19.523Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.title: CVE-2024-29822|2024-06-04T17:58:09.234Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29823|2024-06-04T17:58:00.907Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29205|2024-04-24T23:12:51.923Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: An Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability in the web component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to send specially crafted requests in-order-to cause service disruptions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29824|2024-06-04T17:57:53.599Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29828|2024-05-31T17:38:31.394Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29829|2024-06-04T17:57:37.638Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29848|2024-06-04T17:57:36.120Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.x allows an authenticated, privileged user to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-29825|2024-06-04T17:57:32.267Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29830|2024-06-04T17:57:30.545Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29826|2024-06-04T17:57:27.047Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29846|2024-06-04T17:57:19.104Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an authenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-29827|2024-06-04T17:57:13.815Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: An unspecified SQL Injection vulnerability in Core server of Ivanti EPM 2022 SU5 and prior allows an unauthenticated attacker within the same network to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22059|2024-06-04T17:52:57.179Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Neurons for ITSM allows a remote authenticated user to read/modify/delete information in the underlying database. This may also lead to DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-22023|2024-06-10T17:51:01.005Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: An XML entity expansion or XEE vulnerability in SAML component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated attacker to send specially crafted XML requests in-order-to temporarily cause resource exhaustion thereby resulting in a limited-time DoS.

item.title: CVE-2024-22058|2024-06-07T16:27:04.757Z -- ivanti -- epm
item.description: A buffer overflow allows a low privilege user on the local machine that has the EPM Agent installed to execute arbitrary code with elevated permissions in Ivanti EPM 2021.1 and older.

item.title: CVE-2024-22053|2024-04-04T19:45:10.175Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A heap overflow vulnerability in IPSec component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated malicious user to send specially crafted requests in-order-to crash the service thereby causing a DoS attack or in certain conditions read contents from memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-22024|2024-02-13T04:07:04.355Z -- ivanti -- ics
item.description: An XML external entity or XXE vulnerability in the SAML component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x), Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) and ZTA gateways which allows an attacker to access certain restricted resources without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-22052|2024-04-04T19:45:10.169Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability in IPSec component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated malicious user to send specially crafted requests in-order-to crash the service thereby causing a DoS attack

item.title: CVE-2024-22026|2024-05-22T22:55:11.219Z -- ivanti -- epmm
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in EPMM before 12.1.0.0 allows an authenticated local user to bypass shell restriction and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-22061|2024-06-04T17:52:32.847Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap Overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands

item.title: CVE-2024-22060|2024-05-31T17:38:31.402Z -- ivanti -- itsm
item.description: An unrestricted file upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Neurons for ITSM allows a remote, authenticated, high privileged user to write arbitrary files into sensitive directories of ITSM server.

item.title: CVE-2024-27975|2024-06-04T17:47:33.712Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An Use-after-free vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-27978|2024-06-04T17:47:22.296Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an authenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-27984|2024-06-04T17:46:56.956Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete specific type of files and/or cause denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-27977|2024-06-04T17:46:37.939Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to delete arbitrary files, thereby leading to Denial-of-Service.

item.title: CVE-2024-27976|2024-06-04T17:46:19.979Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-23526|2024-06-04T17:46:03.520Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23530|2024-06-04T17:46:03.124Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23531|2024-06-04T17:45:59.214Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An Integer Overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks. In certain rare conditions this could also lead to reading content from memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23527|2024-04-24T23:12:51.975Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23528|2024-06-04T17:45:54.654Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23532|2024-06-04T17:45:52.608Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds Read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an authenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks. In certain conditions this could also lead to remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-23533|2024-06-04T17:45:49.282Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an authenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23529|2024-06-04T17:45:48.867Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3, in certain conditions can allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to read sensitive information in memory.

item.title: CVE-2024-23534|2024-06-04T17:45:43.815Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: An Unrestricted File-upload vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-23535|2024-06-04T17:45:37.105Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Path Traversal vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands as SYSTEM.

item.title: CVE-2024-24991|2024-06-04T17:43:32.684Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Null Pointer Dereference vulnerability in WLAvalancheService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an authenticated remote attacker to perform denial of service attacks.

item.title: CVE-2024-24996|2024-06-04T17:43:28.208Z -- ivanti -- avalanche
item.description: A Heap overflow vulnerability in WLInfoRailService component of Ivanti Avalanche before 6.4.3 allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2024-21887|2024-01-12T17:02:16.481Z -- ivanti -- ics
item.description: A command injection vulnerability in web components of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) allows an authenticated administrator to send specially crafted requests and execute arbitrary commands on the appliance.

item.title: CVE-2024-21893|2024-06-04T17:37:50.738Z -- ivanti -- ics
item.description: A server-side request forgery vulnerability in the SAML component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Neurons for ZTA allows an attacker to access certain restricted resources without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-21888|2024-01-31T17:51:34.941Z -- ivanti -- ics
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability in web component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure (9.x, 22.x) allows a user to elevate privileges to that of an administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-21894|2024-04-04T22:16:29.330Z -- ivanti -- connect%20secure
item.description: A heap overflow vulnerability in IPSec component of Ivanti Connect Secure (9.x, 22.x) and Ivanti Policy Secure allows an unauthenticated malicious user to send specially crafted requests in-order-to crash the service thereby causing a DoS attack. In certain conditions this may lead to execution of arbitrary code
